glsa.title: oftpd: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: An assertion in oftpd could lead to a denial of service vulnerability.

background.p: oftpd is a small, anonymous only ftp daemon.

description.p: By specifying an unsupported address family in the arguments to a LPRT or LPASV command, an assertion in oftpd will cause the daemon to abort.

impact.p: Remote, unauthenticated attackers may be able to terminate any oftpd process, denying service to legitimate users.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All oftpd users should upgrade to the latest version:
